job description:
Job TitleData Scientist/Analyst - System Analysis and Program - III - ID:31167

Duration6 Months

Start DateASAP

Job SkillsPL/SQL, Shell Scripting, Hadoop, Hive, Spark

Location7701 E Telecom Pkwy-Temple Terrace, FL

Date Posted03/06/2018

Description:

Corporate Data lake is a strategic enterprise initiative to centralize all ERP, supply chain data into Hadoop big data platform and enable reporting, analytics and self service discovery capabilities.

Responsibilities/Skills required for this role include
  • Excellent technical leadership, communication and project management skills.
  • Agile & rapid development mindset, DevOps Experience a Plus
  • Drive and own initiatives with direct business impact and drive timelines and budgets for these initiatives.
  • Work with lead architect and build data ingestion, reconciliation and modeling frameworks
  • Expert in Oracle PL/SQL, Unix, Shell Scripting, Data Modeling - 6 to 8 years plus
  • Experience with big data technologies including Hadoop, hive, Spark
  • Extensive technical expertise on AWS Cloud and performance engineering - 2+ years experience
  • Golden Gate experience is a Plus
  • 4 year degree.
